website_summaries.verdict: This durable light sports a great modern look, but it may not emit enough light for some.
pros: Made of stainless steel and aluminum alloy with a nickel finish
Has two lights for up-and-down illumination (there is also a one-bulb version)
cons: This fixture does not give off a lot of light
Some buyers claim it's not 100% waterproof and that the finish starts to peel after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: If you have tall columns to accent these Porch Lights are great. Here are the bulbs I used: "Hyperikon PAR20 LED Bulb, 8W (50W equivalent), 4000K (Daylight White), CRI90+, Small Flood Light Bulb, 40 Beam Angle, Medium Base (E26)" Glass on both sides and has a tight seal to keep water out. Also ordered the "Naturous PLW01 Waterproof Cylinder Porch Light". This light is a single light to illuminate my house number and matches my porch lights.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, but not watertight in the right places
customer_reviews.text: Really like the appearance and light glow. The top and bottom of the light has a silicone gasket sealed glass cover, which protects from water intrusion. The problem lies in the sides of the light’s tube body, where the light allows water intrusion via the designed knockouts. The plastic diffusers aren’t sealed properly. That results in water entering the side of the light and pooling in the base of the light (see video). Definitely a flaw in that it occurs in all four lights I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: bdkelley

customer_reviews.title: The lights looked great and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The lights looked great and exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately upon closer inspection I noticed the glass was completely cracked in one of them and slightly cracked in the other. Debating whether to order again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Gives off a good amount of light. Had it professionally installed but probably could have installed it myself.
customer_reviews.author: CEL

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these and they've been great. We really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn Software

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: Amazing light fixtures! love love love them.. i got 3 for outside my house. they are on a dust to dawn device. my house is always illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: rramsahai

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: nice fixtures. not cheap but look super classy. Nice easy cap seals for replacing bulb too
customer_reviews.author: Tomas O' Grady

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixtures!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights! I ordered eight of them for my business. All of them came perfectly packaged and intact. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ncw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on porch by front door. Entry cover is very high so light pointing up is nice, and light pointing down helps with even more visibility.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but intall instructions could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights. The installation coul have gone smother if the instructions were more clear that the cover does not screw off. It needs to be popped off. I used a thin screw driver to wedge the cover open.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalio Flores

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights! Puts off a cool pattern against the wall. Nice modern feel looks great on our 1957 Florida Ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde & Shauna

customer_reviews.title: I really like these lights
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lights. I use LED bulbs and it really looks clean and modern paired with our garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These lights look very nice and modern. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Leo2145

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, sharp looking, more than I expected. The price of this item is excellent considering it is Stainless Steel. Compare to others that are brushed steel and will rust. Just installed them with ease. The bulb fit into the socket is a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Snowshoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, looks nice and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: onever

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with shattered glass, most likely shipping. Well built otherwise but I sent it back. Will buy again later
customer_reviews.author: Xenanthenilantheixilithenez

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant look!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quick and as advertised. Looks very elegant and beautiful. Both lamps arrived with little damage caused by shipping but seller worked with me and went above and beyond to solve the issue. The installation was easy enough and had no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Perez

customer_reviews.title: broken glass
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 of these lights. One arrived with broken glass. Love the design but disappointed that one was broken.
customer_reviews.author: awittcat

customer_reviews.title: Well made, husband, electrician and neighbors gave a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered 6 for around our river property and they were so nice, I got 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McBride

customer_reviews.title: Defective in less than 3 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of use, the bottom of the light is rusted and coming off. It can’t be an outdoor light if it is NOT resistente to a little bit of rain and the weather. I can’t even seem to find the contact for the seller anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: All fixtures came with broken glass thanks for the gift!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Water gets into the unit and doesn't leave. Also, while the company claims this is made of "metal", the metallic substance has already been peeling away after 1 month (attached is a photo of the condition of the circular lens). THIS SHOULDN'T BE USED OUTDOORS.
customer_reviews.author: Following Man

customer_reviews.title: A Grear Value
customer_reviews.text: One of five lights came in with a cracked lense. The fixtures have an incredible light pattern and are brighter than expected. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deking PLT01
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these..all three had shattered glass on the inside so I returned them ordered three more this time one of the three had shattered glass so I returned that one too. And ordered another one. I wish I could contact the manufacturer because the mounting nuts were also missing... this company has qualities control issues. I purchased color changing LED light bulbs and it looks great. Hoping the last one gets here unbroken
customer_reviews.author: Russell Strunk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the design but the glass was broken in several places. Needs to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Betty G.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted. Silicon is not applied and lamp fills with water.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 3 of these and two of them are so poorly made that water gets in them and fills the bottom with water. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terence D.

product_meta.title: Outdoor Wall Light, Naturous PLT01 Waterproof Cylinder Porch Light Modern Outdoor Lighting Wall Sconce ETL Listed, Stainless Steel 304 Suitable for Garden,Villa
feature_bullets: 304 Stainless Steel Wall Sconce, Brushed nickel, Made of Stainless Steel(light body),Aluminium Alloy(up/down lids), sealed with Silicone Adhesive.
Waterproof IP54, 2-light outdoor wall light is weather-resistant & rust-resistant.
ETL Listed. Ideal for exterior porch, patio, garden,open field.
Dimension: Φ3.9"*13" inches. Back Plate: 4.3”*4.3”. Embedded wall lamp.
Bulb and Wattage: Required 2 of E27 Bulb(not included), 60W*2 maximum. Recommend using 2 led filament bulbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
